body:
Hey Guys,
   I would just like to clear something up with you. I may have told you guys I am a girl. This is false. The only reason I did this was to protect my identity. I am actually a boy in real life. I just wanted to clear things up with you just so you know what is real. 

    I also may have told you I was 15 or something. This is also false. Again, trying to protect my identity. If you would like to know my real age just ask me on Avicus. 

    I will probably change my skin, but for now, I'll leave it how it is. I hope you guys aren't to upset with me. Although J wouldn't see why you should be upset with me. Anyways, just wanted to clear that up with you.
Regards, Jason
body_tagged:

title: The Truth

replies.body: It's fine :3
replies.body_tagged: It's fine :3

replies.body: If you wanna protect your identity you could just, you know, not say anything.
replies.body_tagged: If you wanna protect your identity you could just, you know, not say anything.

replies.body:
I don't see anything wrong with hiding your true self over the internet. People have done this time and time again, yet we don't mind - anyone, guy or girl, old or young, can be helpful to any community, especially Avicus.

As long as you're you, that's all that matters.
replies.body_tagged:
I don't see anything wrong with hiding your true self over the internet. People have done this time and time again, yet we don't mind - anyone, guy or girl, old or young, can be helpful to any community, especially Avicus.

As long as you're you, that's all that matters.

Easier to believe when theres someone else on the server that makes it more believable ;p
